title: PGPD District IV hosts Movie Night at Glassmanor Elementary
body:
Prince George’s County, Maryland… the Prince George’s County Police Department’s District IV COPS office has partnered with  to host this summer’s second “Movie Night”.  Thirty-five children and a handful of COPS officers gathered at Glassmanor Elementary to watch Twentieth Century Fox's animated movie Rio on Thursday night.  The children enjoyed free popcorn, hotdogs and juices.
  
Posted by


Prince George's County Police
